titleStmt.title: A new catechism short and plain, and very necessary to be learned of the youn ger [sic] sort, before they come to be partakers of the Holy Communion. Published for the benefit of Shaffham School, Norfolk. By Geo. Dochant, minister of Gods word, and there teacher in a private school.
titleStmt.author: Dochant, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold at the sign of the Black-spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls,
